detail_desc: Thin metal chain necklace with two round pendants, one with an embossed pattern. Length 63 cm.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with decorative metal buttons at the top and long, wide raglan sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Wide ribbing around the neckline.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative pompoms on the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a hook and loop tab over the foot, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked bodice. Short, elasticated puff sleeves, and a frill trim at the hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with an appliqué and print motif on the chest. Ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves in a contrasting colour with striped ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxy puffer jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Imitation leather treggings with a high waist with concealed elastication. Embroidery on the legs.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a cut-out section at the waist, a single shoulder strap, high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.

Tunic in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the top and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Quilted, lightweight jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11.5x24 cm.
Strappy top in a sturdy, textured knit with a V-neck front and back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a jacquard-knit motif, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves. Roll-edge neckline with a sewn-on bow, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with an open chest pocket.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with an opening and ties at the front, an elasticated flounce at the top and hem and long trumpet sleeves.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, visible zip at the front, front and back pockets and legs that are flared at the hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Sleeveless playsuit in a woven viscose blend with a deep V-neck front and back and wide flounce trim at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a concealed zip at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter approx. 5 cm.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a motif.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a sequin-embroidered motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Large metal hair grips in various designs. Four decorated with plastic beads and one with sparkly stones. Length 6.5-7.5 cm.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Skirt in a soft weave with elastication at the back of the waist and an asymmetric hem with a flounce.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, diagonal, zipped front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and reflective details. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in lightweight twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose blend. Resort collar, a French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Open chest pocket and slits in the sides.
Blouse in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims, a round neckline and a small opening with shimmering gold button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with concealed press-studs.
Blouse in airy cotton voile with a small frilled collar and concealed button placket. Gathered yoke front and back and short, butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Bell-shaped skirt in sturdy jersey with elastication at the top, a visible zip at the back and a raw-edge hem.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with oversized, raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats around the neckline, a small opening with press-studs at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined. The polyester content of the outer layer is partly recycled.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. High waist with a wide waist panel.
Straight-cut top in an airy weave with a gentle V-neck and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless sports top in jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a drawstring and collar, and a rounded hem.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Non-padded bra in mesh with underwired, unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a batik pattern on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Short gilet with a quilted, lightly padded front, small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Front pockets with a concealed zip and a jersey back with a brushed, thermal inside. Wide ribbing around the armholes and hem. Lined front.

Popover jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, fake buttons at the top and a diagonal zip down the front. Flap front pocket, a yoke at the back and raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Patterned lining.

prod_name: Aussie Tim Tam AO jacq Sweat
detail_desc: Kangol x H&M. Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with jacquard-knit Kangol logos. Ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets at the front and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and a foot strap with concealed elastication. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length dress in a softly draping weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats front and back. Long sleeves and wide, flared cuffs with a slit. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with pleats at the top and a box pleat and concealed slit at the front. Unlined.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in a crinkled weave in a relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Calf-length dress in patterned satin. V-neck at the front with gathered elastication for a draped effect, long sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
High-waisted culottes with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs with a seam at the knees.

Dungaree shorts in an airy, cotton weave with a heart-shaped chest pocket and flounce-trimmed straps with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the front. Back pockets and legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
